rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Welcome area with minimalistic design and Vastu-compliant placement. Suitable for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Contemporary living space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that provide ample natural light while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated within the living area for an open and modern feel. Vastu compliant placement enhances auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Functional space for domestic help located away from family areas but easily accessible for service efficiency.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with an open layout near the dining area. Vastu guidelines suggest placing it in the southeast quadrant.
